name: Skiving: New and Improved
title: Sayu: Skiving: New and Improved
desc: "I should have just stayed in bed today."
inPlayDescription: When your Sayu who has this card equipped is the active character, draw 2 cards when you trigger a Swirl reaction. (Once per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Sayu to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Combat Action: When your active character is <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Sayu, equip this card.When Sayu equips this card, immediately use <span style="color:#FFD780FF">Yoohoo Art: Fuuin Dash once.When your Sayu who has this card equipped is the active character, draw 2 cards when you trigger a Swirl reaction. (Once per Round)(You must have Sayu in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
